version_description:
*Added new perks
*Added new mythical weapon
*Bug fixes and improvements

*Added a brand new planet, do you have what it takes to beat the frozen "Balor"
*Improved game balance and difficulty levels in some planets
*Added a brand new hero upgrade system
*Added a new game mode, your harvester is ready to collect some resources.
*Added a new daily bonus, get better items for free every day
*Added the ability to listen to own music while playing the game
*Improved game graphics
*Bug fixes

A Very Merry Christmas Update!

*Introducing a brand new planet, do you have what it takes to survive the ruthless "Sigal" Planet?
*Mythical items are not enough? we got you! added a brand new rarity "Ultimate", fuse your mythical items, and unleash your real power!
*A brand new hero- Meet Aurora, the Daredevil!
*We got a brand new weapon for you, and it's something you have never seen before.
*Brand new Christmas Winter items that will make you stronger, faster, and much more powerful.
*We added a brand new chest, the Ice Chest, with some amazing Christmas items!
*Stay on the lookout for our special Christmas battle pass, it will be amazing!
